page.title: 11VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The building used as a village hall is known as the{Social Centre.}It is a partly permanent and partly prefabricated structure originally built to house the{Land Army}girls in the{1939/1945 War.}It is used by the Golden Link senior citizens' club, the Youth Club, Gardening Society, Cubs, Scouts, Brownies, Women's Institute, Playgroup, Baby Clinic, jumble sales and exhibitions. The{building}is old,{in need of {replacement,}and a committee is considering ways of funding money to build a new centre.
